DOC.criteria: 1 . Males females 18 50 year age . 2 . Vital sign within normal limit admission study : SpO2 > 94 % , systolic blood pressure 15090 mm Hg , diastolic blood pressure 10060 mm Hg , afebrile . 1 . Any chronic medical condition consider PI contraindication receive yT , include significant cardiovascular disease , diabetes require medication , chronic renal disease , chronic thyroid disease , kidney disease coagulation defect . 2 . Use systemic inhaled steroid . 3 . Use NSAID ASA within 48 hour dose , inability withhold medication duration study . 4 . Use anticoagulant include warfarin , heparin , clopidogrel enoxaparin . 5 . Diagnosis anemia abnormal blood count screen 6 . Known vagal response venipuncture 7 . Abnormal PT PTT value screen . 8 . BMI > 35 9 . Pregnant breast feed woman include .
